DescriptionData.Title: Snazaroo St. Patrick's Day Face Painting Stencil Kits (3 colors)
DescriptionData.Description:
Snazaroo St. Patrick's Day Face Painting Stencil Kit is specially designed to add more color and fun to your St. Patrick's Day Celebrations. Includes 2 ml Snazaroo paints in 3 colors (Bright Green, Lime Green and Gold), a sponge applicator, stencil with Luck of the Irish, clover and clover band. Specially designed to adjust to the curvature of the face or skin. Easy to apply and remove.
Snazaroo Mylar stencils are easy to use, durable and easy to clean. Snazaroo products are all non-toxic and hypoallergenic and meet US FDA, Canadian, and European standards for cosmetic safety.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Each 3 color Snazaroo Stencil Kit will paint about 600 cheek art designs
Includes three 2 ml Snazaroo paints in Bright Green, Lime Green and Gold, plus a sponge applicator and Mylar stencil (Luck of the Irish, clover and clover band).
One of the most popular face paints in the world
